name: Regurgitate
description: '''Regurgitate''' was a Swedish [[goregrind]] band that included members from both [[Stockholm]] and [[Mj√∂lby]]. The band formed in 1990 and ended in 2009, and released four full-length albums. They were one of the most notable practitioners in the goregrind genre, with their most famous album being ''[[Carnivorous Erection]]'' (2000).
